Class MovieController

controller.MovieController
public class MovieController extends Object

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save()
      Save all local changes regarding movies to the database Call the 'save' method for review controllers on all movies Called when terminating the program

    • getAllMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> getAllMovies()
      Used in admin functionality to get all movies
      Returns:
      Arraylist of all movies

    • getShowingMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> getShowingMovies()
      Return an arraylist of all movies, except movies that has status of 'END_OF_SHOWING', used in movie goer functionality
      Returns:
      Arraylis of movies

    • getMovieById

      public Movie getMovieById(int id)
      Get a movie object by its ID
      Parameters:
      id - MovieID to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Movie object that has that id, or null if not found

    • getMovieByTitle

      public Movie getMovieByTitle(String title)
      Get a movie given its title, assuming all movie titles are unique
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Movie object that has that title, or null if not found

    • createMovie

      public void createMovie(String title, int durationMinutes, String synopsis, String director, String cast, Movie.showStatusOptions showStatus, Movie.ageRatingOptions ageRating, boolean is3D, boolean isBlockbuster)
      Create new movie given information of the movie, perform necessary action on database
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the new movie
      durationMinutes - Duration (in minutes) of the new movie
      synopsis - Synopsis of the new movie
      director - Director of the new movie
      cast - Cast of the new movie, should be at least 2 casts, seperated by comma
      showStatus - Show status of the movie based on showStatusOptions enum
      ageRating - Age rating of the movie based on ageRatingOptions enum
      is3D - Boolean value whether the movie is shown in 3D or not
      isBlockbuster - Boolean value whether the movie is a blockbuster or not

    • getMoviesBySales

      public ArrayList<Movie> getMoviesBySales()
      Get List of movies sorted by Sales, do not modify the original movies array
      Returns:
      Arraylist deep copy containing movies sorted by sale

    • getMoviesByRating

      public ArrayList<Movie> getMoviesByRating()
      Get List of movies sorted by Average Rating, do not modify the original movies array
      Returns:
      Arraylist deep copy containing movies sorted by average rating

    • searchMovie

      public ArrayList<Movie> searchMovie(String str)
      Returns an arraylist of movies where 'str' is a substring in its title, Upper case, lower case, blank space are ignored
      Parameters:
      str - Query string for search input
      Returns:
      Arraylist of movies corresponding to search results
